game.title: The Lost Treasure of Eldoria
game.objective: Find the lost treasure of Eldoria, an ancient city hidden deep in the mountains.
game.description: The lost treasure of Eldoria is said to be a magical artifact of immense power. Legend has it that the treasure was hidden by the last king of Eldoria to protect it from falling into the wrong hands. You have been hired by a wealthy adventurer to find the treasure and return it to him.
game.reward: 500 gold pieces and a magic sword

task.objective: Travel to the ruins of Eldoria
task.description: The ruins of Eldoria are located in the heart of the mountains. You will need to travel through dangerous terrain and battle monsters to reach them.

task.objective: Find the entrance to the hidden city
task.description: The entrance to the hidden city is hidden by a magical barrier. You will need to find a way to break it.
The tunnels beneath the hidden city are filled with dangers. You will need to be careful not to fall into traps or get lost in the maze-like passages.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian of the treasure
task.description: The lost treasure of Eldoria is guarded by a powerful monster. You will need to defeat it.

task.objective: Return the treasure to Arvel the Adventurer in Oakwood
task.description: Once you have the treasure, return it to Arvel the Adventurer at Oakwood's Market Square.
